variant.p: If an entity does not restate prior periods applying paragraph 45I or paragraph 45J, at the date of initial application of the amendments it shall recognise in the opening retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) any difference between:

li.p: the previous carrying amount of long-term interests described in paragraph 14A at that date; and
the carrying amount of those long-term interests at that date.
